00012 class PIC {

00015

00020 
00021 public:
00022  
00023  PIC() {}
00024  PIC(double macro, double q, double m, double len, int n) : part(n)
00025         { macroN=macro; charge_p=q; mass_p=m; length=len;}
00026  virtual ~PIC() {}
00027 
00028  int get_size() { return part.size(); }
00029  double get_macro() { return macroN; }
00030  double set_macro(double macro) {macroN=macro;}
00031  double get_m() { return mass_p; }
00032  double get_q() { return charge_p; }
00033  double get_gamma(int j) {return sqrt(1.0+(pow(part[j].ux,2)+pow(part[j].uy,2)+pow(part[j].uz,2))/pow(clight,2));}
00034  double get_vx(int j) {return part[j].ux/get_gamma(j);}
00035  double get_vy(int j) {return part[j].uy/get_gamma(j);}
00036  double get_vz(int j) {return part[j].uz/get_gamma(j);}
00037  double get_energy(int j) { return clight*clight*mass_p*(get_gamma(j)-1.0)/qe;}   
00038  double get_x(int j) {return part[j].x;}
00039  double get_y(int j) {return part[j].y;}
00040  double get_z(int j) {return part[j].z;}
